author: Slidebean
description:
AI threatens the first step of the career ladder not the top.

Routine tasks once used to train new professionals are now handled by AI.

A recent survey shows that two-thirds of companies are reducing or slowing entry level hiring for this reason.

This shift risks collapsing the talent pipeline by removing the earliest opportunities for skill development.

The long term impact of AI may not be workforce replacement but workforce prevention.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: AI isn’t taking your job, it’s taking your first job.
